English Quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

English Quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

English Quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but of playing a poor hand well.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

English Quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

English Quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

English Quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Author: Robert Frost

English Quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
Author: Mark Twain

English Quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
Author: Elbert Hubbard

English Quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
Author: Oscar Wilde

English Quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
Author: Louisa May Alcott

English Quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Author: George Eliot

English Quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
Author: Pablo Picasso

English Quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

English Quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
Author: Benjamin Spock

English Quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

English Quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

English Quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Author: Confucius

English Quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Author: Confucius

English Quote: Study the past if you would define the future.
Author: Confucius

English Quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Author: Winston Churchill

English Quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
Author: Winston Churchill

English Quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
Author: Winston Churchill

English Quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Author: Aristotle

English Quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Author: Aristotle

English Quote: To love is to suffer. To avoid suffering one must not love. But then one suffers from not loving.
Author: Woody Allen

English Quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Author: Lao Tzu

English Quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
Author: Lao Tzu

English Quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Author: Lao Tzu

English Quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

English Quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

English Quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci
